entries.title: Fact-Checkers Are Scrambling to Fight Disinformation With AI
entries.description: Bad actors use artificial intelligence to propagate falsehoods and upset elections, but the same tools can be repurposed to defend the truth.

entries.title: Enter the Hunter Satellites Preparing for Space War
entries.description: True Anomaly, a startup backed by US senator JD Vance's VC firm, plans to launch prototype pursuit satellites on a SpaceX flight later this year.

entries.title: Layoffs Broke Big Tech’s Elite College Hiring Pipeline
entries.description: Students from top schools used to waltz from Silicon Valley internships into lucrative jobs. Now, some are reconsidering their options.
